title: Server crashes when polymorphic value is absent in post body

labels.name: model
labels.description: Related to swagger generate model command

body:
## Problem statement
Generated server crashes when one posts an entity missing a required polymorphic value

## Swagger specification
```yaml
consumes:
- application/json
info:
  title: Pets
  version: 0.1.0
produces:
- application/json
schemes:
- http
swagger: "2.0"
definitions:
  House:
    type: object
    properties:
      pet:
        $ref: '#/definitions/Pet'
    required:
    - pet
  Pet:
    type: object
    discriminator: petType
    properties:
      name:
        type: string
      petType:
        type: string
    required:
    - name
    - petType
  Dog:
    type: object
    description: A representation of a dog
    allOf:
    - $ref: '#/definitions/Pet'
    - properties:
        packSize:
          type: integer
          format: int32
          description: the size of the pack the dog is from
          default: 0
          minimum: 0
      required:
      - packSize
paths:
  "/houses":
    post:
      summary: Creates a house
      produces:
        - application/json
      operationId: postHouse
      parameters:
        - name: body
          in: body
          schema:
            $ref: "#/definitions/House"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: House response
        default:
          description: unexpected error
```
## Steps to reproduce
### Build
```
go mod init pets
swagger generate server
go build ./cmd/pets-server/
./pets-server --port 3000
```
### Failing test (missing polymorphic property `pet`)
```
$ curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:3000/houses -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{}'
curl: (52) Empty reply from server
```

### Passing test (containing required property `pet`)
```
$ curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:3000/houses -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"pet": {"petType": "Dog", "name": "Doggo", "packSize": 10 }}}'
"operation PostHouse has not yet been implemented"
```
